HomeDescription: Explore our #1 destination for organic and eco-friendly products. Healthy, sustainable, and delivered to your door. Shop now!
thank_you_message: Thank you for shopping with us!
support_message: For any queries, contact us at our support channel

footer.description: Our Moroccan E-Shop provides all kinds of bio-organic goods. Our services are designed to fit your healthy lifestyle.

allProductsDescription: Discover our complete range of bio and organic products. From fresh produce to natural skincare, shop sustainably.
CartDescription: Review the bio and organic products you've added to your cart. Checkout to enjoy healthy and eco-friendly shopping.
contactDescription: Get in touch with us. We are here to assist you with your bio and organic product needs. Contact us for any inquiries or support.
description: We believe in the beauty of nature. Our organic products are sustainably sourced to nourish your body, mind, and environment. Join us in creating a greener, healthier future with every purchase.

refund_policy.title: Refund Policy
refund_policy.intro: We strive to ensure your complete satisfaction with your purchase. If for any reason you are not satisfied with your order, we are here to help.
refund_policy.eligibility_description: To be eligible for a refund, you must meet the following criteria:
refund_policy.criteria_1: The item must be unused and in the same condition that you received it.
refund_policy.criteria_2: It must be in the original packaging.
refund_policy.criteria_3: You must provide a receipt or proof of purchase.
refund_policy.non_refundable_3: Some health and personal care items
refund_policy.request_refund_description: To initiate a refund, please contact our customer service team within 30 days of receiving your order. Include the following information in your request:
refund_policy.request_info_2: A brief description of the reason for the refund
refund_policy.processing_refunds_description: Once your refund request is received, we will inspect the item and notify you of the approval or rejection of your refund. If approved, your refund will be processed, and a credit will automatically be applied to your original method of payment.
refund_policy.shipping_costs_description: Please note that shipping costs are non-refundable. If you receive a refund, the cost of return shipping will be deducted from your refund.
refund_policy.contact_us_description: If you have any questions about our refund policy, please contact us:
refund_policy.thank_you: Thank you for shopping with us!

returnsAndExchanges.title: Returns and Exchanges
returnsAndExchanges.returnPolicyDetails: We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. If for any reason you are not happy with your order, you may return it within 30 days of receipt for a full refund or exchange.
returnsAndExchanges.returnEligibility: To be eligible for a return, items must be in their original condition, unopened, and with all original packaging intact.
returnsAndExchanges.nonReturnableItems: Please note that certain items, such as perishable goods, cannot be returned.

returnSteps.step1: Contact our customer service team to initiate the return process.
returnSteps.step2: Provide your order number and the reason for the return.
returnSteps.step3: We will send you a return shipping label and instructions.
returnSteps.step4: Pack the item securely and attach the shipping label.
returnSteps.step5: Ship the package to the address provided by our customer service team.

returnsAndExchanges.exchangeDetails: If you would like to exchange an item for a different size or color, please follow the same steps as the return process. Once we receive your returned item, we will process your exchange and send the new item to you.

faq1.question: 1. How long does it take to process a return?
faq1.answer: Returns are typically processed within 5-7 business days of receiving your package.

faq2.question: 2. Will I be refunded the original shipping costs?
faq2.answer: Unfortunately, we cannot refund the original shipping costs unless the return is due to an error on our part.

faq3.question: 3. What if I received a damaged or defective item?
faq3.answer: If you receive a damaged or defective item, please contact us immediately for assistance.

returnsAndExchanges.thankYou: Thank you for shopping with us! We appreciate your support for organic products.

shippingAndDeliveryPolicy.title: Shipping and Delivery Policy

shippingInformation.title: Shipping Information
shippingInformation.description: We are committed to delivering your organic products in a timely and efficient manner. We offer shipping across Morocco and aim to process and ship your orders as quickly as possible.
shippingInformation.orderProcessing: Orders are typically processed within 1-2 business days, and you will receive a notification with tracking information once your order has shipped.

deliveryTimes.title: Delivery Times
deliveryTimes.description: Delivery times may vary based on your location. Generally, you can expect your order to arrive within 3-7 business days after it has been processed.
deliveryTimes.note: Please note that during peak seasons or holidays, delivery times may be extended.

shippingRates.title: Shipping Rates
shippingRates.description: Shipping costs are calculated at checkout based on the weight and dimensions of your order, as well as the delivery location. We strive to offer the most affordable shipping rates while ensuring your products arrive safely.

orderTracking.title: Order Tracking
orderTracking.description: Once your order has been shipped, you will receive a tracking number via email, allowing you to monitor the status of your shipment. You can also track your order on our website under the 'Order Tracking' section.

internationalShipping.title: International Shipping
internationalShipping.description: Currently, we only offer shipping within Morocco. However, we are working towards expanding our services internationally in the near future. Stay tuned for updates!

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.description: If you have any questions regarding our shipping and delivery policies, please feel free to contact our customer service team.

shippingAndDeliveryPolicy.thankYou: Thank you for choosing us! We appreciate your support for organic products and are dedicated to providing you with the best shopping experience.

termsAndConditions.welcome: Welcome to our platform! These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of our website.

introduction.content: By accessing this website, we assume you accept these terms and conditions. Do not continue to use this service if you do not agree to all of the terms and conditions stated on this page.

intellectualProperty.content: Unless otherwise stated, we and/or our licensors own the intellectual property rights for all material on our platform. All intellectual property rights are reserved. You may access this for your own personal use subjected to restrictions set in these terms and conditions.

userAccounts.content: When you create an account with us, you must provide us with information that is accurate, complete, and current at all times. Failure to do so constitutes a breach of the terms, which may result in the immediate termination of your account.

limitationOfLiability.content: In no event shall we, nor any of its officers, directors, and employees, be held liable for anything arising out of or in any way connected with your use of this website.

linksToOtherSites.content: Our website may contain links to third-party websites or services that are not owned or controlled by us. We have no control over, and assume no responsibility for, the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party websites or services.

changesToTerms.content: We reserve the right to amend or update these terms at any time without prior notice. By continuing to use our website after such changes, you agree to the updated terms.

governingLaw.content: These terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the country in which we operate, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

termsAndConditions.contactUs: If you have any questions about these terms, please Contact us.

1.quote: The quality of the organic vegetables is outstanding! My order was delivered on time, and the experience was seamless. Highly recommend this store!

2.quote: Customer service is excellent. I had an issue with an order, and they resolved it so quickly. Thank you for your great service!

3.quote: I bought organic skincare products, and they exceeded my expectations. My skin feels amazing, and I will definitely shop again!
